name: RRR
title: RRR (Rise Roar Revolt)
description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920s
reviews: A weak writing sparkled by Rajamouli's extraordinary mass elements and Ram Charan & Jr. NTR's larger-than-life characters
A Magnificent Movie By SS Rajamouli

name: Thor
title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

name: Pushpa
title: Pushpa: The Rise - Part 1
description: A labourer rises through ranks of a smuggling syndicate, infuriating some powerful forces in the process.

name: Top Gun
title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
reviews: The truly epic blockbuster we needed.

name: The Batman
title: The Batman
description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.
reviews: Overblown, overhyped latest addition to the Batman franchise
Melodramatic, monstrously long, mediocre, and boring.

name: Spider-Man
title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
reviews: A franchise in decline, and this meta nonsense doesn't help

name: Panchayat
title: Panchayat: Season 1
description: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.
reviews: Heartfelt, kind and honest, Panchayat marks a turning point for comedy series in India

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.
reviews: Just might be the perfect mainstream series
Pretty much the best show made in the history of mankind

name: Scam 1992
title: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
description: Set in 1980s and '90s Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.
reviews: Strong screenplay that needs to be seen.
One Of The Best Indian Web Series i Ever Seen
Once a lifetime experience to watch

name: Friends
title: Friends
description: Set in 1980s and '90s Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.
reviews: One of the best t.v. shows ever!

name: Kota Factory
title: Kota Factory
description: Dedicated to Shrimati SL Loney ji, Shri Irodov ji and Maanniya HC Verma ji, 'Kota Factory' is TVF's latest original. India's first 'Black and White' show highlights the problems present day IIT-JEE aspirants face in their day-to-day lives.
reviews: Bollywood needs to learn from this
Authentic, Well made and Heart Touching

name: Gullak
title: Gullak: Season 1
description: Set in quaint by-lanes in the heart of India, Gullak is a collection of disarming and relatable tales of the Mishra family.
reviews: Takes you back in time. Very well directed
Best web series of the year

name: Gullak
title: Gullak: Season 1
description: Set in quaint by-lanes in the heart of India, Gullak is a collection of disarming and relatable tales of the Mishra family.
reviews: Takes you back in time. Very well directed
Best web series of the year

name: The Family Man
title: The Family Man: Season 1
description: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.
reviews: A near perfect indian espionage thriller
Wait is over and mind has blown.
In the battle between Sacred Games and Mirzapur, The Family Man wins the war.

name: Chhichhore
title: Chhichhore
description: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.
reviews: It's time to shrug off the underdog tag!
